means: 使像花花公子(dandify的过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Freddie was much stouter , more benevolent - looking , cheerful, and far more dandified.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗烈特显得更魁伟, 更善良、更快活, 尤其更像花花公子.

sentence.Network_en: Pen was sarcastic and dandified when he had been in the company of great folks.
sentence.Network_cn: 潘每逢跟一些大人物相处以后,便变得尖酸刻薄,满不在乎地挖苦他们.
